name: 60Seconds
description:
Can you beat the level in 60Seconds?

60Seconds is a platformer game in which the player must beat tough obstacles... and he only has 60 Seconds. Moving platforms,Sliding doors,Rotating Obstacles,everything...

Version 1.00 includes two levels however this will increase as we update the game.

Minimum Requirements

  • 100MB Free Hard Drive Space
  • 2GB RAM
  • 256MB VRAM
  • DirectX10

Please rate and leave a comment to help us improve your experience!!
